mapper.select: select ci.`id` as `id`, g.`goods_name` as `goodsName`, g.`goods_unit` as `goodsUnit`, g.`goods_price` as `goodsPrice`, g.`goods_img` as `goodsImg`, ci.`goods_num` as `goodsNum`, ci.`spec_key` as `specKey`, ci.`spec_key_name` as `specKeyName` from `cart_item` ci left join `goods` g on ci.`goods_id` = g.`id` where ci.cart_id = #{cartId} order by ci.id
